Pathfinder Worker:
Rim Kamaloka is the latest means by which the Darkness strikes at us -- this time, through our very dreams. Unless you withstand the attack, you will die in your sleep.
Our sages have determined that the best defense is to enter that place and mount a preemptive attack. If you have the courage, it is possible to challenge Rim Kamaloka and survive.
Challenge Rim Kamaloka.
Ask about combat in Rim Kamaloka.
Donate Essence of Kamaloka and Essence of Destruction.
Try verifying the "report on infected Kanabions".
